staking.title: RWAF Staking
staking.subtitle: Stake RWAF tokens to earn steady yields and participate in governance

ops.title: Staking Operations
ops.desc: Stake or unstake your RWAF tokens

notice.title: Notice
notice.body: Once you stake for others, it cannot be canceled. Please proceed with caution.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Staking means locking your RWAF tokens in a smart contract to earn network rewards and yield.
faq.a2: The smart contract has undergone security audits to ensure funds are 100% secure.
faq.a3: Rewards are calculated by APY and distributed to your account daily.
faq.a4: Flexible staking can be canceled anytime. Locked staking requires waiting until the lock period ends.
